person.content:
Please identify the "Person" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Mike Cito , 17 , was expelled from St Pius X High School in Albuquerque after an October game in which he used the sharpened chin strap buckles to injure two opposing players and the referee .

Let's think step by step.

1. Mike Cito
2. St Pius X High School (institution where Mike Cito is expelled from)
3. Albuquerque (location of St Pius X High School)
4. Two opposing players
5. Referee.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Person.

1. Mike Cito
2. Two opposing players
3. Referee.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Person".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Person |
|--------|
| Mike Cito |
| Two opposing players |
| Referee |
